content.html: Something trivial that needs to still be said: Your software architecture will be better for maintenance and reliability if the person making the architectural decisions is also a person who will write the code, and will be a person oncall when that code is deployed.
content.value:
Something trivial that needs to still be said:

Your software architecture will be better for maintenance and reliability if the person making the architectural decisions is also a person who will write the code, and will be a person oncall when that code is deployed.
